resources.string: Some of your input could not be validated.
Try again after granting the required system permission.
To get started, create a new device in the "Devices" section of your organizer account in the pretix backend. You will be then presented with a configuration QR code to scan.
The QR code you scanned is for an old predecessor of this app. Please go to the "Devices" section in your pretix organizer account and create a new device there.
The QR code you scanned is not a valid configuration code. Please make sure you created the code in the "Devices" section of a pretix organizer account.
The QR code you scanned is from a newer version of pretix than this app has been built for. Please check if you can get an update for this app!
Request rejected by server. Please double-check your input.
Connection error while trying to reach the server.
Security error while trying to reach the server.
Server error while trying to register the device.
The server returned an invalid response.
The app does not work properly without granting those permissions. Please restart the app.
Please grant camera permission to use the QR Scanner
Please press the hardware scan buttons of your device to scan.
